title: The amount of people that DON'T know...
body: ... That the green dot next to the portraits on the left of the screen, means you or team mate has ult available...

replies.body: I didn't know this until I had about 100 wins :P

I can just see now the amount of people that DIDN'T know that... 

Read this...

And then said to themselves...

"Yeh, I knew dat..."
